entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Drumheller
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:38 AM MDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Drumheller 03:00 AM MDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
Temperature: -11.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -13.0°C
Wind: S 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 20 March 2023
